divs: Sighting Detailsit all started on fall night i was getting ready to go to sleep at about an hour until midnight in my room, as i was laying in bed i decided to open my window curtains just a bit to look at the night sky and mountain view, then i saw these three lights immediately hoovering over the mountains in a triangular shape they were all stationary in the sky but individually rotating position very quickly, stoped for two seconds then abruptly shot or speed off at a very high speed. from the begining i knew it had to be a ufo i was amazed to be seeing it when i did, after wards i was very excited .
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Palm Desert
There were no other sightings in Palm Desert on or around October 15th 2010
